title: The AI bubble may pop. People’s use of AI for information won’t.
description: When it comes to AI, there is a growing murmur that we are in bubble territory and might be headed for a burst, perhaps as early as next year. A key reason commonly cited is the large chasm between AI computing infrastructure spending and AI revenue, as well as the lack of clear business models...
